mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wanteds(title, detail, position_code_id, career_code_id, pay, enddate, created) VALUES(#{wantedTitle},#{wantedDetail},#{positionCodeId},#{careerCodeId},#{pay},#{enddate}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT w.company_id, w.id, w.title, w.detail, w.position_code_id, w.career_code_id, p.name positionName, c.name careerName, if(w.enddate > NOW(), '채용중', '마감') state FROM wanteds w LEFT OUTER JOIN positions_code p ON p.id = w.position_code_id LEFT OUTER JOIN careers_code c ON c.id = w.career_code_id WHERE w.company_id = #{companyId}
mapper.update: UPDATE wanteds SET wanteds.view_count = wanteds.view_count + 1 WHERE id = #{wantedId}
mapper.select: SELECT w.id, IF(w.enddate > NOW(), '모집중', '마감') AS status, pc.name positionCodeName, cc.name careerCodeName, w.title, w.detail, w.view_count, c.company_name, c.region_code_name, w.created, w.enddate FROM wanteds w LEFT OUTER JOIN positions_code pc ON pc.id = w.position_code_id LEFT OUTER JOIN careers_code cc ON cc.id = w.career_code_id LEFT OUTER JOIN companys c ON c.id = w.company_id WHERE w.id = #{wantedId}

SELECT w.id, pc.name positionCodeName, cc.name careerCodeName, w.title, c.company_name, c.region_code_name, IF(w.enddate > NOW(), '모집중', '마감') AS status FROM wanteds w LEFT OUTER JOIN positions_code pc ON pc.id = w.position_code_id LEFT OUTER JOIN careers_code cc ON cc.id = w.career_code_id LEFT OUTER JOIN companys c ON c.id = w.company_id WHERE w.enddate > NOW() ORDER BY w.created DESC
